layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x84
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x84 [color=#00FF00]
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x18 [color=#FF0000]
      LayoutInline {span} at (0,0) size 473x18 [color=#00FF00]

          text run at (0,0) width 368: "This paragraph, and all textual contents in the document, "
          text run at (367,0) width 106: "should be green."
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
    LayoutBlockFlow {ul} at (0,50) size 800x18 [color=#FF0000]

          text run at (0,0) width 171: "This item should be green."
